title: Impact_of_Time_Weather_Traffic_on_Vehicle_Usage
name: Analyzing the Impact of Time, Weather, and Traffic on Bike and Car Usage (2023)
description: Comprehensive analysis of how time, weather conditions, and traffic patterns influence bike and car usage in Melbourne for the year 2023. This use case involves data manipulation, exploratory data analysis, temporal analysis, correlation analysis, and visualization to derive actionable insights for urban planning and traffic management.
